summary: THE VEHICLE WAS TURNED OFF AND THE TRANSMISSION WAS PLACED IN REVERSE.  THE DRIVER THOUGHT THE KEY WAS IN THE ACCESSORY POSITION BUT IT WAS NOT.  THE DRIVER EXITED THE VEHICLE AND WENT TO PULL THE KEY OUT THE IGNITION WHEN IT SUDDENLY STARTED AND RAN OVER HER.  THE DRIVER SUSTAIN 2 BROKEN BONES IN HER RIGHT LEG AND A BROKEN COLLAR BONE.  THE CONSUMER BELIEVES A CLUTCH SAFETY SWITCH SHOULD BE INSTALLED.  *NLM   *NLM
